channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Protect for Space Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Protect for Space Management

item.title: CVE-2018-1882|2024-08-05T04:14:39.073Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20for%20space%20management
item.description: In a certain atypical IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1 configurations, the node password could be displayed in plain text in the IBM Spectrum Protect client trace file. IBM X-Force ID: 151968.
